entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bachelors Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 45 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 8:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 11. Forecast issued 8:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 8:50 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
